tweet: Money flow in $crypto  1. Fiat (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP)  2. #Bitcoin  3. Large Cap Altcoins (e.g. $ETH, $LTC)   4. Mid Cap Altcoins (e.g. $NEO)   5. Low Cap Altcoins (e.g. $MFT)   6. $BTC again  7. Fiat   Recognise which market phase we are in & plan where to put your capital in next
